creator: hans@gefionsoftware.com
text:
The spec says that <c:url> has an attribute named "url", but the TLD declares it
as "value" (which, IMHO is better since it's consistent with similar actions).

creator: bayern@essentially.net
text:
The spec was updated to match the RI.  How's that for the tail wagging the dog? 
:-)

(Actually, it was decided that 'value' made more sense.)
